"Gardeen Frame":
"What was that place on Lilipur again?
The Underworks, was it? I don't think there would
be much in the way of ingredients to cook with
down there, but there are sure a lot of automata.
Speaking of which, do you know that small
automata called the Gardeen? Well, I was
thinking it would make a nice cooking utensil,
so... Could you please get me a Gardeen frame?

*Target: Gardeens level 31 or higher"
"ガーディンのフレームの調達"

"惑星リリーパの地下坑道、だっけ？
流石に食材なんかはなさそうだけど
そのぶん機甲種はいっぱいでしょ？
ガーディンっていう、小型の機甲種。
あれのフレームが軽くて丈夫らしいのよ。
料理器具に使いたいなー、なんて……
……はい、ということで
私からひとつお願いがあります！

※Lv.31～のガーディンが対象"
